Another idea would be to use the sun and stars to navigate. By using a compass and the position of the sun and stars, I could determine my direction and location.
I could also use my phone to access information about the area, such as the location of popular landmarks or points of interest. I could use this information to guide me in the right direction.
I could use my sense of smell to navigate. Some plants and animals have distinct smells that can help me identify my location.
I could also use my sense of touch to navigate. For example, I could feel the texture of the ground or the presence of certain objects to help me determine my location.
I could use my sense of hearing to navigate. Certain sounds, such as the sound of water or the chirping of birds, can help me identify my location.
